bug.author: edouardoyallon
bug.summary: Codecov seems to not take in account the GPU part on FI
bug.description:
Hi! There is a drop of coverage because the GPU part seems dropped. Any suggestions/ideas? <denchmark-link:https://codecov.io/gh/kymatio/kymatio>https://codecov.io/gh/kymatio/kymatio</denchmark-link>
Thanks.

comments.comment: any suggestions to improve the coverage toward GPU?
